<title level="1" right="Hazard 1" pfs="">[Lyzerium Bottle](/Hazards.aspx?ID=165)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Mechanical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=105" />
<trait label="Trap" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=158" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #178: Punks in a Powderkeg](/Sources.aspx?ID=119) pg. 64</row>

**Complexity** Simple

</column>

Five tiny glass bottles, each full of volatile green liquid, are discretely positioned around the room. Each bottle explodes when its glass is broken.

---

**Stealth**
DC 16

**Disable**
Interact action to pick up one of the five bottles

<column gap="tiny">

**AC** 13, **Fort** +4, **Ref** +6

**Bottle Hardness**
1

**HP**
4 (BT 2)

**Immunities**
critical hits, object immunities, precision damage

</column>

**Explode** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** A creature steps on the bottle or the bottle becomes [broken](/Conditions.aspx?ID=2); **Effect** The bottle explodes, dealing 2d8 fire damage plus 2 [persistent fire damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) and 2 fire [splash](/Traits.aspx?ID=150) damage to each creature sharing its square (DC 18 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save).
